products.name: Saint Laurent Skinny-Fit 15cm Hem Washed Stretch-Denim Jeans
products.brandedName: Saint Laurent Skinny-Fit 15cm Hem Washed Stretch-Denim Jeans
products.description: Blue jeans are a fail-safe for casual days, especially when they look and feel as good as this pair from Saint Laurent . In the label's signature skinny cut, they've been expertly made in Japan with a bit of stretch and are artfully faded for a broken-in effect. Wear yours with everything from chukka boots to high-tops. Shown here with The Elder Statesman T-shirt, Saint Laurent jacket, Saint Laurent sneakers, Saint Laurent Backpack. This item is small to size; see Size & Fit notes. - - Blue washed stretch-denim- Belt loops, five pockets, whiskered, faded- Button and zip fastening- 98% cotton, 2% elastane- Dry clean- Made in Japan

products.name: Acne Studios Ace Skinny-Fit Stretch-Denim Jeans
products.brandedName: Acne Studios Ace Skinny-Fit Stretch-Denim Jeans
products.description: Acne Studios is a master of effortless cool and these 'Ace' jeans typify the aesthetic. This skinny-fit pair is constructed from stretch-denim and treated to resistant fading through frequent wash and wear. Discreet utilitarian detailing including flat rivets on the back pockets, narrow seams and three-needle stitching on the inner legs further speak to the label's understated yet considered approach to design. Shown here with a Marni jacket, Tomorrowland sweater, Uniform Wares watch and Acne Studios sneakers. - - Black stretch-denim- Belt loops, five pockets- Button and zip fastenings- 94% cotton, 5% polyester, 1% elastane- Machine wash- Designer wash: Stay Cash

products.name: Saint Laurent Skinny-Fit 15cm Hem Washed Stretch-Denim Jeans
products.brandedName: Saint Laurent Skinny-Fit 15cm Hem Washed Stretch-Denim Jeans
products.description: Expression, modesty, sex appeal, simplicity, are the characteristics Saint Laurent 's eponymous founder Yves prescribed jeans, lamenting that he'd not invented them himself. It's fitting then that the brand has made them its stock in trade in recent years, particularly the skinny variety. This pair is cut in the signature silhouette, but has been infused with a decent amount of stretch and stonewashed for a soft, flexible fit. You won't have trouble slotting the faded black hue into your current arsenal. Shown here with Saint Laurent sweater, Saint Laurent sneakers. - - Black washed stretch-denim- Belt loops, five pockets, faded- Button and zip fastening- 98% cotton, 2% elastane- Dry clean - Made in Italy
